overview: An Algerian doctor decides to leave the troubles in Algiers and goes back to his hometown, a small village lost in the mountains. There, however, the situation is explosive as well, as the guerilla is active and the French military has to keep a close watch on the locals...

production_companies.name: Office National pour le Commerce et l'Industrie Cinématographique (ONCIC)

title: Opium and the Stick
